dialogue: Hello! Yes! This is Thelma Post. My grandson Danny Markowitz was, uh, involved in an accident of some kind. He has a broken nose--
Yes! Daniel Markowitz. Daniel Alexander Markowitz.
What do you need? What can I--
Don’t worry, ma’am. We’re going to handle this. I’m going to need you to mail $10,000 to this address--
Can you drive to the post office?
I don’t drive anymore. I don’t have a car.
Then how about a cab? And remember, it has to be cash. We don’t want him sitting in there any longer than he has to. I’m going to give you the mailing address. Are you ready?
